Favorite Thing About Technical Support

What is your favorite thing about providing technical support?

For me Technical Support is the best of both worlds. I'm always itching to get my hands on the newest tech and if my wife weren't in my life to reign me in I would probably be broke. I also love helping people and
teaching them the benefits of technology. I am a people pleaser, which has pros and cons, but in Tech support its a huge plus. I'll never stop until the customer is happy and I'll always make sure my team has what it
needs from me not because its my job, but because I enjoy it.
